c14ed4de-ed05-4299-a8dc-9b424ef93fc5.name: Oxygen Storage
c14ed4de-ed05-4299-a8dc-9b424ef93fc5.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

6ff4f181-5ee6-47e1-a0e4-e6fba9c367bf.name: Oxygen Storage
6ff4f181-5ee6-47e1-a0e4-e6fba9c367bf.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

8a5112df-aa26-4fa9-a02a-f9032e05d08c.name: Oxygen Storage
8a5112df-aa26-4fa9-a02a-f9032e05d08c.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

543f544e-5b5c-418c-be3f-153e39ccd555.name: Oxygen Storage
543f544e-5b5c-418c-be3f-153e39ccd555.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

25ba677c-4f2c-4f01-96e8-88412c9ff553.name: Oxygen Storage
25ba677c-4f2c-4f01-96e8-88412c9ff553.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

405673ec-767a-4eb8-99d1-d9a55b41b398.name: Flight
405673ec-767a-4eb8-99d1-d9a55b41b398.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

6dbec511-ab8c-4497-bf52-531f0c282652.name: Diffuse
6dbec511-ab8c-4497-bf52-531f0c282652.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

a009c4b6-534c-45e3-b7dc-9a6c14be8530.name: Homogenous
a009c4b6-534c-45e3-b7dc-9a6c14be8530.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

4adf85f1-ec98-46f6-aa7b-b591f79ea00f.name: No Blood
4adf85f1-ec98-46f6-aa7b-b591f79ea00f.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

aaa4eef3-839f-4196-80f4-48c9048e6383.name: No Brain
aaa4eef3-839f-4196-80f4-48c9048e6383.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

b7ad8f3c-fd23-47fa-8164-6be6c9984b64.name: No Eyes
b7ad8f3c-fd23-47fa-8164-6be6c9984b64.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

421f96d6-0b8c-4d41-acc0-474c86bb7cd6.name: No Head
421f96d6-0b8c-4d41-acc0-474c86bb7cd6.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

f84deb16-73d2-4a0a-aaba-c8e6d96f73a3.name: No Neck
f84deb16-73d2-4a0a-aaba-c8e6d96f73a3.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

7c08f084-1b28-47de-b79a-56ca774077c7.name: No Vitals
7c08f084-1b28-47de-b79a-56ca774077c7.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

4e84a649-e884-4401-8d30-8a4f819e6711.name: Unliving
4e84a649-e884-4401-8d30-8a4f819e6711.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
